title: So apparently Riot Condones Racism and Sexism?
body:
https://twitter.com/Froskurinn/status/1035896107480440833

https://twitter.com/Froskurinn/status/1035859336994541568

https://twitter.com/Froskurinn/status/1035865050974539776

Honestly, why is she walking free? Because she is a woman?

Two men were fired for getting involved in something that she was also told not to get involved in. Rito, pls. You told all your employee's to not get involved. She got involved.
